message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm asking for $14,000 to start the conversation. What do you think?
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget considerations, but $11,000 is quite a bit lower than what I had in mind.  This product offers significant value, and I'm confident it will exceed your expectations. How about we meet in the middle at $12,500?
I understand that the product has value, but I still think $12,500 is a bit steep. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about $11,500?
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this.  I'm willing to come down a bit further, but I need to stay above $12,000. Would you consider $12,200?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $12,000, but no higher. Can you meet me at $12,000?
